snippet: A gunman opened fire on an American security team that was training Yemeni soldiers, the Pentagon said Friday, but denied claims by a militant Islamist group that a C.I.A. officer had been killed in the assault
abstract: Gunman opens fire on American security team training Yemeni soldiers; Pentagon denies claims by Islamist group that a CIA officer had been killed in the assault, saying no one was injured.
lead_paragraph: A gunman opened fire on an American security team that was training Yemeni soldiers, the Pentagon said Friday, but denied claims by a militant Islamist group that a C.I.A. officer had been killed in the assault

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
